about_the_game:
Plot

Strangers of the Power 3 tells a story about a woman named Marion who has gift of healing. This gift made her want to become an adventurer. After passing the trials, her first job is less than a glamorous one; take care of a critter problem that a city has.

However, this seemingly simple first job takes a turn for worse that threatens the lives of many people, potentially changing the lives of everyone around Marion…
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Traditional turnbased combat with 4 person party
  • Handpainted art for the character portraits
  • 360 degree rotatable camera within 3D enviroment, with plenty of emphasis on hidden items and secrets thanks to this

reviews:
“Strangers of the Power 3 is a good adventure rpg indie game, nice execution, classic turn-based combat system, pretty characters and design (dont forget to rotate the camera to discover items). Fun!”
Games without Borders

“It's the 1st 3D game with 360 degree camera movements among Tuomo's games. It features a classic turn-based JRPG. It reminds us of PS1 game titles. You can experience Tuomo's unique sense in this game”
Nyanco Channel
short_description: Young adventurer's trial by fire gets out of hand and threatens the lives of multiple people.
